summary: Tired of how pointless it is to rob a house in Skyrim? Annoyed by the rolls of paper weighing a pound, and single pieces of charcoal weighing half that? This mod aims to fix some of these issues by adjusting weights and values of common clutter objects around the houses of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vPBJsLL.png[/img]

Tired of how pointless it is to rob a house in Skyrim? Annoyed by the rolls of paper weighing a pound, and single pieces of charcoal weighing half that? This mod aims to fix some of these issues by adjusting weights and values of common clutter objects around the houses of Skyrim.

I\'ve tried to balance them out decently, so as to not be [i]too[/i] overpowered, but if you notice any glaring issues or have any balancing advice, leave a comment or send me a PM.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/omDcAM8.png[/img]
Extract Worthwhile Clutter.esp to the Data folder in your Skyrim directory.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/BsrbHy2.png[/img]
Remove Worthwhile Clutter.esp from the Data folder in your Skyrim directory.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/tO2R057.png[/img]
Version 1.0
 - Initial Upload

[img]http://i.imgur.com/7l3ZP86.png[/img]
Bethesda - For giving me a reason to make this mod
author: Shadow771
